name: Jetride
description:
Evade  all the obstacles, get to the boss and destroy it to win!

The spaceship flies along a circular axis so

use the <-- and --> arrows to move along the circular axis to evade the various obstacles

use the ^ and v arrows to accelerate and decelerate.

right click to shoot the basic projectile ( you can keep holding it), you can destroy only some of the less sturdier obstacles ( rocks and enemy spaceships). 

when you manage to destroy enough obtacles the yellow power gouge will replenish.

when at least 1 stock of the gauge is full use left click to fire a laser with high depth, it will destroy even the normally undestroyable obstacles.

Look out for Power-Ups along the way to help you navigate easier:

- Double projectiles: double the shots fired  for the basic projectiles

-Piercing Projectiles: shoot piercing shots with high damage with fixed rate

-Shield: protects the player for 10 seconds

-Companion: small attached jet that shoots with fixed rate and normal damage

CAN YOU GET TO THE BOSS AND DEFEAT IT?
